name: shsub1i

body.origin:
|- wss(c0, co(c0, cph, c1))
-| wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cph, c1)))
-| diffsc(hs0, c0)
-| diffsc(hs0, co(c0, cph, c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wss(c0, co(c0, cph, c1))
-| wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cph, c1)))
-| diffsc(hs0, c0)
-| diffsc(hs0, co(c0, cph, c1))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cph, c1)))
-| wcel(c0, csh)
-| wcel(c1, csh)

cumulated.origin:
|- wss(c0, co(c0, cph, c1))
-| diffsc(hs0, c0)
-| diffsc(hs0, co(c0, cph, c1))
-| wcel(c0, csh)
-| wcel(c1, csh)

|- wss(c0, co(c0, cph, c1))
-| diffsc(hs0, co(c0, cph, c1))
-| wcel(c0, csh)
-| wcel(c1, csh)

|- wss(c0, co(c0, cph, c1))
-| wcel(c0, csh)
-| wcel(c1, csh)

comment: Subspace sum is an upper bound of its arguments. (Contributed by NM, 19-Oct-1999.) (New usage is discouraged.)
